alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 3:09PM CDT until July 04 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Webster County in north central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 309 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eupora, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eupora around 315 PM CDT. Walthall and Bellefontaine around 320 PM CDT. Mathiston around 335 PM CDT. Clarkson around 340 PM CDT. Cumberland around 350 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
